Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsClusterConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsClusterConfig

  • public class WlsClusterConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains configuration of a WLS cluster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WlsClusterConfig​(java.lang.String clusterName)
      Constructor for a static cluster when Json result is not available
      WlsClusterConfig​(java.lang.String clusterName, WlsDynamicServersConfig dynamicServersConfig)
      Constructor that can also be used for a dynamic cluster *

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getClusterName​()
      Returns the name of the cluster that this WlsClusterConfig is created for
      int getClusterSize​()
      Returns the number of servers that are statically configured in this cluster
      int getDynamicClusterSize​()
      Returns the current size of the dynamic cluster (the number of dynamic server instances allowed to be created)
      int getMaxDynamicClusterSize​()
      Returns the maximum size of the dynamic cluster
      java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> getServerConfigs​()
      Returns a list of server configurations for servers that belong to this cluster, which includes both statically configured servers and dynamic servers
      java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizePayload​(int clusterSize)
      Return the payload used in the REST request for updating the dynamic cluster size.
      java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizeUrl​()
      Return the URL path of REST request for updating dynamic cluster size
      WlsDomainConfig getWlsDomainConfig​()
      Returns the WlsDomainConfig object for the WLS domain that this cluster belongs to
      boolean hasDynamicServers​()
      Whether the cluster contains any dynamic servers
      boolean hasStaticServers​()
      Whether the cluster contains any statically configured servers

      Associate this cluster to the WlsDomainConfig object for the WLS domain that this cluster belongs to
      java.lang.String toString​()

      Validate the clusterStartup configured should be consistent with this configured WLS cluster.
      void validateReplicas​(java.lang.Integer replicas, java.lang.String source, java.util.List<ConfigUpdate> suggestedConfigUpdates)
      Validate the configured replicas value in the kubernetes WebLogic domain spec against the configured size of this cluster.

      • getDynamicClusterSize

        public int getDynamicClusterSize​()
        Returns the current size of the dynamic cluster (the number of dynamic server instances allowed to be created)
        Returns:
        the current size of the dynamic cluster, or -1 if there is no dynamic servers in this cluster

      • getMaxDynamicClusterSize

        public int getMaxDynamicClusterSize​()
        Returns the maximum size of the dynamic cluster
        Returns:
        the maximum size of the dynamic cluster, or -1 if there is no dynamic servers in this cluster

      • validateClusterStartup

        public boolean validateClusterStartup​(oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.v1.ClusterStartup clusterStartup,
                                      java.util.List<ConfigUpdate> suggestedConfigUpdates)
        Validate the clusterStartup configured should be consistent with this configured WLS cluster. The method also logs warning if inconsistent WLS configurations are found.

        In the future this method may also attempt to fix the configuration inconsistencies by updating the ClusterStartup. It is the responsibility of the caller to persist the changes to ClusterStartup to kubernetes.

        Parameters:
        clusterStartup - The ClusterStartup to be validated against the WLS configuration
        suggestedConfigUpdates - A List containing suggested WebLogic configuration update to be filled in by this method. Optional.
        Returns:
        true if the DomainSpec has been updated, false otherwise

      • validateReplicas

        public void validateReplicas​(java.lang.Integer replicas,
                             java.lang.String source,
                             java.util.List<ConfigUpdate> suggestedConfigUpdates)
        Validate the configured replicas value in the kubernetes WebLogic domain spec against the configured size of this cluster. Log warning if any inconsistencies are found.
        Parameters:
        replicas - The configured replicas value for this cluster in the kubernetes weblogic domain spec for this cluster
        source - The name of the section in the domain spec where the replicas is specified, for logging purposes
        suggestedConfigUpdates - A List containing suggested WebLogic configuration update to be filled in by this method. Optional.

      • getUpdateDynamicClusterSizeUrl

        public java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizeUrl​()
        Return the URL path of REST request for updating dynamic cluster size
        Returns:
        The REST URL path for updating cluster size of dynamic servers for this cluster

      • getUpdateDynamicClusterSizePayload

        public java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizePayload​(int clusterSize)
        Return the payload used in the REST request for updating the dynamic cluster size. It will be used to update the cluster size of the dynamic servers of this cluster.
        Parameters:
        clusterSize - Desired dynamic cluster size
        Returns:
        A string containing the payload to be used in the REST request for updating the dynamic cluster size to the specified value.
